title: Readability index calculation for Spanish texts
text: readabilityes provides tools tokenize, segment, assess readability Spanish-language texts. includes: Sentence segmentation respects abbreviations (e.g., Sr., Dra.), initials (J. R. R.), ellipses, decimals. Word tokenization controls lowercasing, accents, punctuation, hyphens, numbers, symbols/emoji. Basic counts: words, sentences, syllables (approx. ES). Per-word averages (syllables/letters/characters). Szigriszt‚ÄìPazos (szigriszt_pazos()). INFLESZ (inflesz(), returns score + category). Guti√©rrez de Polini (gutierrez_de_polini()). Optionally, Flesch Flesch‚ÄìKincaid applied text.
